Nov 30 (Reuters) - CAST SA YAS.PA:

  • ANNOUNCED TODAY THAT IT HAS ACHIEVED AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) MIGRATION AND MODERNIZATION COMPETENCY STATUS

  • CAST ACHIEVES AWS MIGRATION AND MODERNIZATION COMPETENCY STATUS
